Actions.Name: Create a meeting [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Create a meeting instead.
Create a new meeting based on the parameters specified.

Actions.Name: Create a meeting (Preview)
Actions.Description: Create a new meeting based on the parameters specified.

Actions.Name: Get a meeting
Actions.Description: Returns the meeting details for the specified meeting.

Actions.Name: Get meeting attendees
Actions.Description: Returns a list of attendees for a meeting with the given ID.

Actions.Name: List upcoming meetings
Actions.Description: Returns upcoming meetings for the authenticated organizer.

Actions.Name: When a meeting is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a new meeting is created

Actions.Name: Update a meeting
Actions.Description: Updates an existing meeting specified by meetingId.
